> [{quoted}](name=Squidsmastah,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=osPEaBE3,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2015-10-08T21:08:11.921+0000)

Not so much the Void overall, just Cho'Gath is considered monstrous even by other Voidborn. If anyone is gonna be upset about demons though, Tahm is the one that should be upsetting them. He's 100% canonically a _literal demon that feasts on despair. _ Despair which he creates by _tricking people into underhanded "deals with the devil." _
Im pretty sure even cho'gath knows not to get close to rek'sai. Even by void standards she is the top of the food chain.
Yeah, canon Rek'Sai (like malphite) is fucking gigantic. But again, like malphite, is super scaled down for gameplay reasons
Rek'Sai is only the size of a truck.. but don't quote me because I forgot where I read that from.

cho would just have her impaling her self on all the spikes he can form in the ground by stomping... but ya until cho hit's his final form reksai could tear him apart if she got close at his final form he can maybe survive long enough to bite a chunk out of her and try and use his spikes to create some space again but he'd be gimped after that trade.

{{champion:203}}  Literal demon?
Since when was Death considered a demon? O_o
{{champion:17}}
{{champion:1}}
I didn't know {{champion:35}} was a demon. I thought he was just some guy who went insane. o_O
Now we just need to hope some Religious arse doesnt say "This promotes Satan and is bad for the game". sorry ... had my fair share of those people
inb4 someone like that would actually play this game.

You don't need to play the game to complain about it.

Look at Smite and Kali.

Second note: Don't downvote Caytheles. What I'm saying proves him right and Agbudar wrong. Don't upvote Agbu for making a point that doesn't stand.
What happened?

Kali is a 4 armed assassin type in smite whose entire godly lore is about her being roughly an embodiment of death and destruction. one of her biggest pieces of lore has her drinking blood from another god she is fighting while wearing nothing but a loin cloth.

So smite added her to the game in a mail bikini, which is more than what she wears in half of her art works from her very own damn religion, and made her skills about drinking and manipulating blood to kill her targets.

all of a sudden a large number of assahats in india proclaim that Smite has both over sexualized her to a main stream half naked female with what they claimed to be an overly gory skill set. so she was given normal clothes and bland skill names and made a generic not as naked half naked female with standard assassiny things to do.
I've read that those threats actually came from a single person who just claimed they were part of a big group.

What kind of threats can you possibly make? Oh our Country won't play your game bc it's too offensive! Really? Well that's 1 less country playing my game I wouldn't change my shit for anyone. Like it or not play it or don't but keep your opinion up your own chute.

We are talking not only about a country,but about a whole religion(which is pretty much the 3rd largest religion in the world)
roughly 15% of the world population are hindus,that is quite the number.
Sooooo true.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/V088UgE4-vi-has-the-number-of-the-beast-on-her-right-leg-in-new-skin?comment=00000000

I posted this a little over a day ago and the very first comment it got was a guy saying that he will now never play this skin, and it was upvoted.

some people cant just enjoy it for the joke and the theme instead of getting all "oh lawdy it's a satan reference. i must now purify mine self with holy water and the name of the lord to lead me not into sin and temptation."

get over yourselves. it's a game and a joke. laugh. move on.
"Christians" are the most evil people this world has ever given birth to.

that and door to door salesmen

but seriously just ask the crusaders.

> [{quoted}](name=agbudar,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=osPEaBE3,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-10-08T17:13:35.338+0000)
>
> inb4 someone like that would actually play this game.

Somebody like that does play this game; I returned to LoL just recently ( Not my first account ) in fact and saw Brofresco's video on the skin just yesterday. I have to admit the skin makes me very uncomfortable ( almost uncomfortable enough to quit ) and I hope Riot decides not to release the skin but I'll continue to play the game as long as I'm not forced to have the skin on my account.

No offence sir/ma'am but nearly all mainstream games have content such as this, and Riot had this theme even before this skin with champs such as {{champion:120}} {{champion:35}}{{champion:429}} .  Now I know the account you're posting on is level 9 but  suggest you quit league while you're ahead because more of this content is only going to be made.
Undead isn't the same as demonic.
Shaco- the Demon Jester. .-.

Shaco- The only one of the three with demon in the name, and the least demonic or evil of the three. 
He's about as Demonic as the Joker. Lots of evil, no real demonic power.
